channel.title: Website Design and Price Plugins
channel.description:
[quote="hasssan.n30@gmail.com"] Hello SquareSpace Maven,
I'm trying to build a website on SquareSpace platform for my commodities venture - www.goldbrex.com but not the best designer out there.
I need you to completely make the website amazing using best techniques of UIX and graphic design techniques to have it up and running. Most importantly. I need this live gold price plugin there - http://www.goldcorp.com/English/Home/default.aspx (top right hand corner) also an interactive page with gold price from its inception to now graph showcasing it (https://www.bullionvault.com/gold-price-chart.do)
Please let me know if you are able to do this and provide me with a quote.
Thanks! -- Hassan [/quote]

item.title: Website Design and Price Plugins
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Well, after much consideration I must say this will be a big task.

And there's a lot we would need to settle down and discuss before we can reach a final result. Every single aspect of what you asked requires a lot of deliberation.

We're looking here for something that would cost at least U$ 2000 from my point of view right now. To give yet another perspective, an optimistic one, I suppose it won't surpass U$ 4.5 k, but it will all depend on many details.

My suggestion is starting with 1 day of work, which would be U$ 345 (half paid upfront) and we can move from there. We would spend a few hours organizing the whole project on skype or hangout and what could be delivered in the end of the day.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Design and Price Plugins
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

I ask everyone to carefully read www.cregox.com/your-home

Your case is very distinct from what I usually get, by all measures.

I'll check with a partner if he can take this and I'll let you know soon enough.

Read full topic
